summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1465, for the improvement of 32nd Avenue South, from Irving Street to Massachusetts Street; Irving Street, from 31st Avenue South to 32nd Avenue South; Day Street from 31st Avenue South to 32nd Avenue South; Atlantic Street, from 31st Avenue South to 32nd Avenue South; all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, by constructing a concrete bulkhead, under Ordinance No. 15772 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
